PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SensorTypeHumiditySensor
PropertySetDef.Definition: A device that senses or detects humidity. HISTORY: HumiditySensorSetPoint changed to SetPointHumidity. Range, accuracy and time constant deleted.

PropertyDef.Name: SetPointHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: The humidity value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.
